properties.title: best western continental breakfast
properties.description: I woke up early and visited the complimentary breakfast in the Best Western basement. I had orange juice, a banana, cereal, and a singular breakfast sausage. I ate pretty quickly and then got on the road.

properties.title: scream/sing i hate suburbs volume 4/10
properties.description: The first ten or so kilometres out of Mentor were along Johnnycake Ridge Road, which I sang on repeat in a weird made-up jig that was meant to annoy passing drivers. The suburban roads were predictably annoying but I eventually made it to Lakeshore, where an intermittent bike trail of sorts was available.

properties.title: yo its a rest day chill with this hill
have very good coffee at duck rabbit and charge phone
properties.description: Once in Cleveland I went straight to Duck Rabbit coffee, where I had an odd pastry and a delicious pourover. I caught up with Adrian via text for a while, sipping on the coffee.

properties.title: incredible puerto rican food omg yes
chill on nice rail trail and watch the trains go by
get back wheel tuned for free by ohio city bike coop wow yall the best
properties.description: I eventually arrived at a bike co-op, where I planned on pumping my tires. I noticed that the brake/rear wheel rubbing was still happening, though (I had noticed it before the trip started, but it was minor) so I asked them to look at it. A very helpful man and I chatted over it for a while, before he eventually decided to true the wheel. That just about fixed the problem. They insisted on not charging me for the service but I objected and gave a donation instead. They wished me well on the rest of my trip and I eventually pedaled off.

properties.title: shower and put street clothes on
eat incredible bbq, meet trucker, meet insurance guy
properties.description: I met a trucker at the bar of a delicious barbecue restaurant. We compared gas stations. I also met this insurance agent who was on the verge of retiring. His specialty was defending bicyclists in car accidents. Needless to say, he gave me his business card.
